name: Statisticalrethinking 2ed assignments
body:
## Welcome to the solution to the assignments by Deportivo Bayesiano

We are a group of scientists from Buenos Aires Argentina that are interested on Statistical Modelling for the behavioural sciences.

This work was done during Covid's 19 social isolation.

It is still a work in progress but you can check [Chapter's 2 assignments](https://spiousas.github.io/StatisticalRethinking_2ed_Assignments/Chapter_2.html) so far.

Enjoy!

## Contributors

[Ignacio Spiousas](https://github.com/spiousas) and [Pablo Etchemendy](https://github.com/petcheme)
